ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm STM Lens + <3> Canon 2400 DSLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> 58mm UV Filter + <10> Additional 58mm UV Filter + <11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm & 55-250mm IS STM Lens with 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Tripod + Flash + Kit
